page.title: 18SCHOOL LIFE, WINGERWORTH
page.content: Our school,{Hunloke Park,}is getting bigger. Next term we are having a new class because of all the children moving into the new houses. We will have 4 infant and 4 junior classes. The oldest class, the 4th years, help the infants alot, taking them to their classes at the end of playtime or by looking after them indoors during 'wet play'. They also serve the younger ones at the dinner tables. The{school day}starts at 9.00am, but alot of children come earlier to practice music, gymnastics or plays which they perform in asssembly. There is a 20 minute break in the morning, 1hr 15mins for lunch and 15 mins in the afternoon. School ends at 3.15pm for infants and 3.30pm for juniors. At playtime children play a wide variety of games or just sit and chat.
